page.title: Mobile Banking
page.description: Hong Leong Connect Mobile Banking App allows you to access your banking accounts on-the-move, to perform instant fund transfer via your mobile phone and to locate Hong Leong Bank's points of services, whenever and wherever. Download the App today from your iPhone, BlackBerry and Android smart phone.
page.tab:
Account Inquiry

  • Check your account balances and transaction history on-the-move, whether you are stuck in a jam or commuting on the train.

PEx - Payment Express

  • The simplest and quickest mobile-to-mobile payment service! PEx enables you to pay from your Hong Leong Current or Savings Account to any local mobile number on your smart phone contacts address book or to anyone with a local mobile number.

Locate & Link-Up

  • Our interactive branch locator is now made available on your mobile phone! Find the nearest Hong Leong ATM, Branch, eBanking Centre, Bureau de Change, Business Centre, Cash Deposit Machine, Cheque Deposit Machine, HLebroking, Priority Banking, and Trade Services. You'll also able to locate Hong Leong Promotions and merchant tie ups around you.

Hong Leong Connect Mobile Banking is secure & safe.

  • Your Mobile Banking PIN is tied to your smart phone. So a 3rd party will not be able to login to your account from another smart phone

  • You are required to deactivate your Hong Leong Connect Mobile Banking under the following scenario, before you can proceed with new Mobile Banking registration:
    1. When your mobile phone is lost/stolen
    2. When you change your mobile phone
      3.      
    3. When you cancel your Hong Leong Connect Online Banking account and re-register again
  • 2 options to deactivate/cancel your Mobile Banking:

    • Login to Hong Leong Connect Online Banking and email us via Compose Message in the Message menu, select Deactivate/Cancel Mobile Banking in the Enquiry Category.

      OR

    • Call our Customer Service at 03-7626 889

Get started with the following checklist:

  • An active Hong Leong ATM / Debit Card / Credit Card
  • A Smart Phone of any of the below specifications :
Manufacturer
 Model
Apple IOS version 4.x and beyond
Apple iPhone 3GS / iPhone 4 / iPhone 4S / iPhone 5
Android OS version 2.x and beyond
Samsung Galaxy S / SII / SIII, Note I / II Nexus
HTC Desire / Hero / Legend / Incredible
Blackberry OS version 5.0 and beyond
BlackBerry Curve / Bold / Pearl / Storm / Torch
  • Internet PIN - You can obtain the Internet PIN from any Hong Leong Bank's ATM . This is required for first time registration of your Hong Leong Connect Mobile Banking App.
